name: Hotel Amigos Family Bar and Restaurant

reviews.review_text:
Hotel Amigos is a hidden gem located in the Mollem National Park—definitely off the beaten path. It offers a spacious setting with a great vibe, making it ideal for family visits and kid-friendly.

We tried a variety of seafood, and everything was delicious. The Prawns Tempura were top-notch, and the Pomfret Rawa Fry was good, but the Surmai Masala Tawa Fry and Tandoori Surmai were absolutely yum! We even ordered multiple servings of them.

For dessert, we tried the Caramel Custard—it was tasty but a bit too sweet for my liking.

The best part? All of this delicious food was surprisingly affordable. Though it’s a bit far to visit frequently, it’s definitely worth the try. Loved the experience!

We went to this place while returning from Goa as a pit stop to have dinner. We didn't expect much out of it. To our surprise it served absolutely amazing seafood, they had a great variety of other nonveg and veg options too. Very satisfied with the service and food.

The restaurant is by the road side. Very much feasible to locate. The ambience was too good and cool.
We had Squids masala fry as starter and Prawns curry rice with Reachado Mackrell.The taste of all the dishes takes u to heaven with the very first bite. Lastly we had Caramel pudding as sweet dish.
The service person was very kind, helpful and patiently explained abt the available dishes.  Highly recommend this place..
